fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: The Payment Services Directives, Electronic Money Directive, Anti-Money Laundering Directive, Cross-Border Payments Regulation, Single European Payments Area, General Data Protection Regulation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Established in 2015, Revolut is a global money app, allowing customers to send and spend money instantly and securely nearly anywhere in the world. Users can use the multi-currency RevolutCard™ to make purchases in over 130 currencies, and transfer money in-app or via social networks – all at the touch of a button via mobile device. It’s like having a local bank account wherever you are with a streamlined and transparent user experience.
